position: Software Engineer-II @ Nielsen | Ex- Monarch Tractor (Enlume Tech) | IIT Kharagpur | Big Data, Python, Django, AWS, System Design

experience.title: Software Developer
experience.description: • Led backend API development and microservices architecture using Python and Flask, ensuring scalability and efficiency for the Monarch Tractor Project.• Implemented serverless components with AWS Lambda functions, optimizing system performance and resource utilization.• Integrated MQTT service for real-time communication among tractor components, facilitating seamless data exchange and synchronization.• Optimized SQL queries with SqlAlchemy and MySQL databases, resulting in significant improvements in query performance.• Developed low-latency tractor live-streaming service using WebRTC.• Contributed to the development of the cloud-based platform for managing remote computing devices in the Intrapolis project, focusing on scalability and productivity enhancements.
experience.description_html: • Led backend API development and microservices architecture using Python and Flask, ensuring scalability and efficiency for the Monarch Tractor Project.• Implemented serverless components with AWS Lambda functions, optimizing system performance and resource utilization.• Integrated MQTT service for real-time communication among tractor components, facilitating seamless data exchange and synchronization.• Optimized SQL queries with SqlAlchemy and MySQL databases, resulting in significant improvements in query performance.• Developed low-latency tractor live-streaming service using WebRTC.• Contributed to the development of the cloud-based platform for managing remote computing devices in the Intrapolis project, focusing on scalability and productivity enhancements.

experience.title: Machine Learning Engineer
experience.description: •  Deployed custom ML algorithm using Python and it’s modules.• Design and development of Computer Vision real world problem, face mask detection, Hand Gesture detection, Speed of car estimation using Machine learning algorithm, Deep learning, CNN, Keras, Tensorflow, TesseractOCR and Create Endpoint Rest API using Django and flsk.•  Developing custom summarization model to summarize using Deep Learning.
experience.description_html: • Deployed custom ML algorithm using Python and it’s modules.• Design and development of Computer Vision real world problem, face mask detection, Hand Gesture detection, Speed of car estimation using Machine learning algorithm, Deep learning, CNN, Keras, Tensorflow, TesseractOCR and Create Endpoint Rest API using Django and flsk.• Developing custom summarization model to summarize using Deep Learning. <!---->

projects: [{"title":"Message Spam or Ham Classification (NLP)","start_date":"Aug 2021","end_date":"Present","description":"• The goal of this project is to use Data science to accurately classify whether a message is spam or not.• I have implemented CountVectorizer for data modeling exercise. I used Naive bayes, Decision tree and SVM classification model for getting good result. All of them SVM model was 98.7% accurate and f1-score-96%, recall-93%, precision-98% and Compared the results with Naive bayes and Decision tree classifier."},{"title":"Pneumonia Detection using CNN (Transfer learning)","start_date":"Jun 2021","end_date":"Jun 2021","description":"• Built a system use transfer learning using VGG16 model and customize our model to predict whether a person has Pneumonia or not. Implemented using ImageDataGenerator and keras. The model was 94.5% accurate."},{"title":"Stock Market Prediction using LSTM (Deep NLP)","start_date":"Apr 2021","end_date":"May 2021","description":"• Performed for predicting stock prices is using a long short-term memory neural network (LSTM) for time series forecasting. LSTM model have 98.7% accurate and f1-score-96%, recall-93%, precision-98."},{"title":"License Plate Recognition System: Computer Vision (ANPR)","start_date":"Oct 2020","end_date":"Oct 2020","description":"• The aim of this Automatic Number Plate Recognition (ANPR) system is to detect the number plate and fetch the text of number plate.• I have used Haar-cascades per-trained XML file which containing feature of number plate. And used TesseractOCR (Pytesseract) to detect the text."},{"title":"Personal Portfolio Python with Django","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"◦ Technologies Used: Employed an array of technologies including Python, Django, HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.◦ Architectural Pattern: Implemented the project using Django’s MVT (Model-View-Template) architecture, leveragingits logic to render templates and incorporate static files such as CSS, JavaScript, and images.◦ UI Development: Created a dynamic and visually interactive UI by utilizing Python 3, HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript,Django, and the MVT architecture."},{"title":"Movie Recommendation System using Collaborative filtering (R-NN)","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"• The objective of this recommender system machine learning algorithm is to offer “relevant” suggestions to users.• Building recommender system to give relevant suggestion I have used Scikit-learn’s CountVectorizer, Cosine-similarity and K- nearest neighbor algorithm."},{"title":"M.tech | Observational analysis of Intensity and Track of Cyclone formed over North Indian Ocean (NIO) during years (1980-2020)","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"• Aim of this Project is to identify trends of Intensity and track of cyclone.• Analysis of past 40 year data from Indian Meteorological Department (IMD) to identify the trends of variation of cyclone events on North Indian Ocean and its basin Bay of Bengal & Arabian Sea. Along with I also track the path of cyclone over the ocean and land by using latitude and longitude coordinates.• I have used mainly python programming languages and its module like pandas, NumPy, matplotlib, Seaborn, and SciPy."}]
